online-bca.name: Online Bachelor of Computer Applications
online-bca.headline: IGNOU Online BCA Admission 2025
online-bca.description: Admissions for January 2025 are now open at Indira Gandhi National Open University. Interested students can apply until the specified deadline following IGNOU’s guidelines. IGNOU offers admissions twice a year, in January and July.
online-bca.eligibility: 10+2 or equivalent from a recognized board. Basic English language skills are also recommended.
keyFeatures: Top Distance Learning University in India
Approved by All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE)
admissionProcess: Fill the counseling form for guidance from our expert counselor

courseDetails.title: Assignments
courseDetails.description: Students have one BCA course assignment to finish before their final exam. The university has set a deadline for this. To avoid any issues, students need to submit their assignment to the nearest study center before the deadline.

courseDetails.title: Examination at the Conclusion of the Term
courseDetails.description: The University holds a term-end exam for the Online BCA course twice a year, in June and December. Students who want to take the exam need to fill out an exam form and pay a fee.

courseDetails.title: Online Study Resources
courseDetails.description: IGNOU also offers students online resources in various formats. The university has created software that allows students to access and download their books anytime. Through this app, students can also watch recorded lectures.

courseDetails.title: Assessment
courseDetails.description: The IGNOU Online BCA examination consists of two parts: assignments (30% of the final grade) and semester exams (70% of the final grade). To pass the course, students must score at least 40% on the final exam.
